books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story about the Jazz Age in the United States.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about the serious issues of race and rape in the Deep South.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A story about a teenager's disillusionment in the 1950s.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel that critiques the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: The narrative of a ship captain's obsession with hunting a giant whale.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.description: A historical novel that chronicles the French invasion of Russia.

books.title: The Odyssey
books.author: Homer
books.description: An epic poem that follows Odysseus's journey home from the Trojan War.

books.title: Crime and Punishment
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.description: A psychological drama that delves into the mind of a criminal.

books.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.description: A philosophical novel about a man whose portrait ages instead of him.
